horrorbullz.title: Partnership with HorrorBullz HQ
horrorbullz.description: Our exclusive collaboration with HorrorBullz HQ brings together the finest in luxury bulldog breeding with cinematic inspiration. Each dog carries the legacy of legendary film characters.

characters.name: Joker
characters.description: Inspired by the iconic villain, this line represents bold chocolate and tan coloring with a mischievous spirit.

characters.name: Hannibal Lecter
characters.description: Sophisticated and intelligent, this line features dark brindle patterns with aristocratic presence.

characters.name: The Substance
characters.description: Pure and elegant, representing the finest cream and white bulldogs with pristine genetics.
